code: import{useState}from"react";import'./App.css';import Error from'./error/error.js';import Login from'./login/login.js';import NavBar from'./navbar/NavBar.js';import LogicManager from"./businesslogic/LogicManager.js";import MainPage from"./mainpage/main.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[news,setNews]=useState([]);const[view,setView]=useState('login');const refreshError=option=>{if(option===1){const newError=LogicManager.getInstance().getExceptionManager().getMessage();if(newError!==""){setNews(prev=>[...prev,newError]);setTimeout(()=>{refreshError(-1);},3000);}}else if(option===-1){setNews(prev=>prev.slice(1));}else{}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{setNews:err=>refreshError(err),setView:view=>setView(view)})}),news&&news.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Error,{message:news,setError:err=>refreshError(err)}),view==='login'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{setView:view=>setView(view),setError:err=>refreshError(err)}),view==='mainpage'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainPage,{})]});}export default App;
